Author: 4lions
Title: [Pre-ITO] 4Lions: An ITO to Invest in Commercial Real Estate Worldwide
Body: WEBSITE |WHITEPAPPER |VIDEO |TELEGRAM    Our vision For many years, hype around the cryptocurrencies has not been getting down. Some think that this might be is a market bubble, although others risk it and invest getting profit, unfortunately, there are also losers in this game.  It needs to be stated that the main problems of "true" ICO investment are insecurity of investors, non-transparency of investment schemes and structures, the absence of any clear info about the objecs of investment, possible risk and profits.  We want to change the game! Within a significantly changed market environment we would like to offer ITO investment vehicle with asset-backed tokens, legally formed and transparent structure and investment potential.  Based on the Ethereum platform, 4LIONS PRO is created to invest in commercial real estate projects for further rental business foundation. LION tokens,backed with shares of the legal entities holding liquid real estate objects, will gain capital, give profit and be traded at crypto-exchanges.    Targets of the project  Clear and secure gateway of cryptocurrencies placement from investors all over the world in stable assets Investments into high yield projects of commercial real estate on emerging markets Professional legal and financial supervision, fully KYC-compliant and secured blockchain environment    Tasks of the project  Provision of LION token with a preference share. Manage the electronic shareholders’ registry through smart contracts and blockchain technologies. Ensure business transparency and pay 100% of net profit to token holders. Formation of relevant corporate and legal structure for the needs of investment project. Creation of web presentation platform and investors’ verification based on worldwide KYC standards. Deposit and withdrawal of crypto and fiat money after successful verification of investors. Fair profits, fully paid taxes, pay-off dividends under the supervision of top-rated bank and cryptocurrency exchange.    Future development and marketing of lion token  100% of net profits of the project are paid to holders of LION tokens 10% of the new tokens of each new implemented project are distributed among holders of current LION tokens During next ITO shares of current token holders are converted into new project shares    Characteristics of the Current ITO Project  1 LION token = 1 preference share of 4LIONS LTD = equivalent of $120 All owners of shares are confirmed by the blockchain Ethereum ERC20 standard registry records Mandatory identification of investors – LION token holders Fund raising in popular crypto-currencies (BTC, ETH) Partners of project – EU bank and financial institutions Legal support by international law firm   Number of tokens available at 1st ITO – 300 000  Pre-Sale phase: 1 week only minimum number of purchased tokens – 10 bonus – 30%  Main sale phase: 1st week bonus – 20% 2nd week bonus – 10% 3rd week    Pre-ITO Start on 1st of December  1 LION token = $120  Soft Cap 57 000 LION Tokens  Cap  70 000 LION Tokens  Goal 122 000 LION Tokens   Road Map |Buisness Structure |Team |FAQ|Privacy Policy|Services Agreement|Terms of Use

Author: 4lions
Title: [Pre-ITO] 4Lions: An ITO to Invest in Commercial Real Estate Worldwide
Body: The 4Lions team mainly worked with the real sectors of the economy, in which personal meetings are important. Social networks have no positive effect in the offline world. Yes, social networks give an imaginary guarantee. Look at the scam projects, there are links to the social network for 5 pieces for each team member. We propose to become a co-owner of a business, not a platform.   And do not be under the illusion that any platform that wants to merge offline and online business will not require personal meetings, process tracking, etc. Our team is ready to disclose information about itself before the pre-sale, to the subscribers of the site 4lions

Author: 4lions
Title: [Pre-ITO] 4Lions: An ITO to Invest in Commercial Real Estate Worldwide
Body: Yes, gathered funds will be spent for the purchase of a large premise in the modern business center class A in very good location of the city, its repairing and remodeling, dividing it into offices of small and middle size (25-80 sq.m each), getting it furnished. These small and medium size offices will be rent out along with a package of services: telephone line, internet, possibility to use IT technician, secretaries, kitchen, meeting rooms, MFP and so on. Just imagine, an international company requires a representative office in Moscow in good location with all infrastructure but to keep there 1-3 representatives (moreover not permanently sitting there) it is useless to rent 150-200 sq. m (less than 150 sq.m you will hardly find), hire secretary and IT specialist, be worry about their labor agreement, salary and taxes. Instead such company can rent a small office of 30 sq. m in our case in reputable business center in the heart of the city and have all they need without headache. Our secretaries can answer their calls, meet their guests, treat them with tea/coffee, they can use a meeting room, underground car parking and all other things. This model is similar to REGUS business model https://www.regus.com/. We see it highly demanded.  Since we are buying shell& core premises and invest in repairing and equipment its value will be higher after upgrade. Besides based on statistics the value of commercial real estate is growing in the area of business activity in big cities. Plus it will be a working rental business model that will be attractive for purchasers. All these should make the capitalization of token grow.  Concerning the protection of token holder. Surely the tokens could be sold on the certain stage of the project but we are going to give more protection. In comparison of many other ICO projects we would like to issue tokens backed with preferred shares of legal entity what will give investors a legal connection between the invested funds and the asset. In our opinion the absence of such connection arouse distrust among investors and gives some light-fingers possibility to cheat people. Blockchain instrument will be used as well. So the investor will receive tokens and the shares.
